CHAT.comment: Chi and Mot sit next to each other a table. Sis is also at the table and Chi holds the book so that Sis can see the pictures. Chi reads very fluently and clearly , as well as with expression and confidence. She reads louder than she talks , as if performing. She also pauses to comment on the story , perhaps because of Sis's presence. Mot remains in the background , providing encouraging comments and correcting Chi's pronunciation of one word. Sis seems very interested in the book reading , eagerly viewing the pictures and initiating comments about the storyline. At the close of the activity Mot seems to pay more attention to Sis's efforts than to Chi's.

u.a: points to hole , puts finger through
providing correct pronunciation (accent on right syllable)
